subtitleNullable: Perform Text Classification in Malayalam using this Dataset
descriptionNullable:
This data set contains ~6300 news article headlines which I had collected from Malayalam news websites.

The data set has been cleaned and contains train and test set using which you can benchmark your classification models in Malayalam

The scripts which were used to create the data set can be found [here](https://github.com/goru001/nlp-for-malyalam/tree/master/datasets-preparation)
title: Malayalam News Dataset
subtitle: Perform Text Classification in Malayalam using this Dataset
description:
This data set contains ~6300 news article headlines which I had collected from Malayalam news websites.

The data set has been cleaned and contains train and test set using which you can benchmark your classification models in Malayalam

The scripts which were used to create the data set can be found [here](https://github.com/goru001/nlp-for-malyalam/tree/master/datasets-preparation)
